author: Farah Hannoun
title: Former Bellator champ and ex-UFC fighter Will Brooks signs with Ares FC
description: Ares FC has stacked up its roster with notable UFC veterans, most recently adding Will Brooks.
content:
Ares FC has stacked up its roster with notable UFC veterans.
Its latest addition is former Bellator lightweight champion and ex-UFC fighter Will Brooks (20-5 MMA), who was expected to make his promotional debut at Ares FC 2 on Aug. 1 before the event was can… [+1128 chars]
